name: Residential Charging Solutions Rebate
description: Up to 100% rebate to cover full cost of PG&E-approved EV charging equipment installed by licensed California electrician
fullDescription: PG&E's Residential Charging Solutions Rebate covers up to 100% of the cost of home EV charging equipment and installation for income-qualified customers, making electric vehicle ownership more accessible.
whatTheyOffer:
- Up to 100% rebate on EV charger cost
- Covers installation by licensed electrician
- PG&E-approved charging equipment
- Available for CARE/FERA customers
- Level 2 charging capability
- Faster home charging than standard outlet
howToGetIt:
1. Must be enrolled in CARE or FERA program
2. Must own or lease an electric vehicle
3. Choose PG&E-approved charging equipment
4. Hire licensed California electrician
5. Complete installation and inspection
6. Apply for rebate with documentation
